WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Worker_Preferred_Time_Zone_Data.description: A unique reference for the Worker whose Preferred Time Zone is being updated.

validation.validation: Can't find a system user for the Worker specified in this request. Specify a valid Worker for the request which must be associated to a valid system user.

Time_ZoneObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Time_ZoneObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Time_ZoneObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Element Containing Worker Reference and Preferred Time Zone Reference.
